name: Classic Car School:Driving Sim
description:
Classic Car School: Driving Sim is the advanced driving school on the play store to teach the young drivers how to quickly and easily one could start learning driving, car driving and 4x4 jeep driving with vast vehicle experience and very friendly instructors, get on the roads and starts your first trail of driving keep your driving fear behind the wheel and play to learn driving now!
Features------------
Car training school with realistic
US Florida driving school with modern physics
Latest vehicles including truck driving school to experience the LTV driving
Register now for an online driving school to drive multiple vehicles.
Different vehicles controls including, steering wheel, buttons and tilt.
